_header: Each day that shineth persuade the latter stowre [?store]
Subjects: death, approach of; transitoriness, of life
_description: On taking each day as it comes — one couplet

CamTCCB1641.Transcription:
Eche day that shyneth persuade the latter stowrehappye befalleth soo
                    the vnhoped houre
CamTCCB1641.Note:
Added to front pastedown of Statutes of Richard Fitz-James, Bishop of
                    London, edited 1516 with calendar.
